name: Broken Glass Kids World at War (Demo)
name_original: Broken Glass Kids World at War (Demo)
description:
In the year 2045 the world is at war and over 76 million people have been enlisted across the U.S into the army. The U.S, Russia and what is left of the European Union have joined forces to fight Germany, China, Italy, and Japan. You are commander and chief Nico. Play through this exciting RPG campaign  to end  the war and defeat Germany. 

The demo includes the entire Texas campaign and gameplay mechanic. Please remember this is a demo so things are subjected to change. Please also leave feedback so I can make the game not suck at launch.
